verses.verse: אָ֚ז <WH227> Then יִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> Then Joshua לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <WH7206> the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֑י <WH1425> and the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> and the half מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> tribe מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> of Manasseh

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> You שְׁמַרְתֶּ֔ם <WH8104> unto them Ye have kept אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> all that Moses עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַתִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> you and have obeyed בְקוֹלִ֔י <WH6963> my voice לְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> i צִוִּ֖יתִי <WH6680> in all that I commanded אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not עֲזַבְתֶּ֣ם <WH5800> Ye have not left אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֵיכֶ֗ם <WH251> your brethren זֶ֚ה <WH2088> these יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> these many עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH8104> but have kept אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֕רֶת <WH4931> the charge מִצְוַ֖ת <WH4687> of the commandment יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> and now הֵנִ֨יחַ <WH5117> hath given rest יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And now the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> your God לַֽאֲחֵיכֶ֔ם <WH251> unto your brethren כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> as he promised לָהֶ֑ם וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> now פְּנוּ֩ <WH6437> them therefore now return וּלְכ֨וּ <WH1980> and go לָכֶ֜ם לְאָהֳלֵיכֶ֗ם <WH168> you unto your tents אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> [and] unto the land אֲחֻזַּתְכֶ֔ם <WH272> of your possession אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> gave לָכֶ֗ם מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> which Moses עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> you on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan

רַ֣ק ׀ <WH7535> but שִׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> heed מְאֹ֗ד <WH3966> But take diligent לַעֲשׂ֨וֹת <WH6213> to do אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <WH4687> the commandment וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתּוֹרָה֮ <WH8451> and the law אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> charged אֶתְכֶם֮ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> which Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> of the LORD לְ֠אַהֲבָה <WH157> you to love אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֜ם <WH430> your God וְלָלֶ֧כֶת <WH1980> and walk בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all דְּרָכָ֛יו <WH1870> in all his ways וְלִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> and to keep מִצְוֹתָ֖יו <WH4687> his commandments וּלְדָבְקָה־ <WH1692> and to cleave ב֑וֹ וּלְעָבְד֕וֹ <WH5647> unto him and to serve בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <WH3824> him with all your heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH5315> and with all your soul
וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖ם <WH1288> blessed יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> So Joshua וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֔ם <WH7971> them and sent them away וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> went אֶל־ <WH413> to אָהֳלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH168> unto their tents ס

וְלַחֲצִ֣י ׀ <WH2677> Now to the [one] half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> of the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> of Manasseh נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> had given מֹשֶׁה֮ <WH4872> Moses בַּבָּשָׁן֒ <WH1316> [possession] in Bashan וּלְחֶצְי֗וֹ <WH2677> but unto the [other] half נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> thereof gave יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> Joshua עִם־ <WH5973> among אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH251> their brethren [מֵעֵבֶר כ] (בְּעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> beyond ק) הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan יָ֑מָּה <WH3220> westward וְ֠גַם <WH1571> So כִּ֣י <WH3588> when שִׁלְּחָ֧ם <WH7971> sent them away יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> And when Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to אָהֳלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH168> also unto their tents וַיְבָרֲכֵֽם׃ <WH1288> then he blessed

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> And he spake אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> and to לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto them saying בִּנְכָסִ֨ים <WH5233> riches רַבִּ֜ים <WH7227> with much שׁ֤וּבוּ <WH7725> Return אֶל־ <WH413> to אָֽהֳלֵיכֶם֙ <WH168> unto your tents וּבְמִקְנֶ֣ה <WH4735> cattle רַב־ <WH7227> much מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> and with very בְּכֶ֨סֶף <WH3701> with silver וּבְזָהָ֜ב <WH2091> and with gold וּבִנְחֹ֧שֶׁת <WH5178> and with brass וּבְבַרְזֶ֛ל <WH1270> and with iron וּבִשְׂלָמ֖וֹת <WH8008> raiment הַרְבֵּ֣ה <WH7235> much מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and with very חִלְק֥וּ <WH2505> divide שְׁלַל־ <WH7998> the spoil אֹיְבֵיכֶ֖ם <WH341> of your enemies עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲחֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH251> with your brethren פ

וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <WH7725> returned וַיֵּלְכ֡וּ <WH1980> and departed בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children רְאוּבֵ֨ן <WH7205> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children גָ֜ד <WH1410> of Gad וַחֲצִ֣י ׀ <WH2677> and the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> of Manasseh מֵאֵת֙ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> from the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִשִּׁלֹ֖ה <WH7887> out of Shiloh אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> which [is] in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan לָלֶ֜כֶת <WH1980> to go אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> unto the country הַגִּלְעָ֗ד <WH1568> of Gilead אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> to the land אֲחֻזָּתָם֙ <WH272> of their possession אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נֹֽאחֲזוּ־ <WH270> whereof they were possessed בָ֔הּ עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֥י <WH6310> according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> And when they came אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּלִיל֣וֹת <WH1552> unto the borders הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> of Jordan אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> that [are] in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיִּבְנ֣וּ <WH1129> built בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children רְאוּבֵ֣ן <WH7205> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children גָ֡ד <WH1410> of Gad וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> and the half שֵׁבֶט֩ <WH7626> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֨ה <WH4519> of Manasseh שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> there מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> there an altar עַל־ <WH5921> by הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> by Jordan מִזְבֵּ֥חַ <WH4196> altar גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> a great לְמַרְאֶֽה׃ <WH4758> to see to

וַיִּשְׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> heard בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> say הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold בָנ֣וּ <WH1129> have built בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> Behold the children רְאוּבֵ֣ן <WH7205> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children גָ֡ד <WH1410> of Gad וַחֲצִי֩ <WH2677> and the half שֵׁ֨בֶט <WH7626> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <WH4519> of Manasseh אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> an altar אֶל־ <WH413> at מוּל֙ <WH4136> over against אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan אֶל־ <WH413> in גְּלִילוֹת֙ <WH1552> in the borders הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> of Jordan אֶל־ <WH413> on עֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> at the passage בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> heard בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּקָּ֨הֲל֜וּ <WH6950> gathered themselves together כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole עֲדַ֤ת <WH5712> [of it] the whole congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel שִׁלֹ֔ה <WH7887> at Shiloh לַעֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> to go up עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> against לַצָּבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to war פ

וַיִּשְׁלְח֨וּ <WH7971> sent בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> unto the children רְאוּבֵ֧ן <WH7205> of Reuben וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> and to the children גָ֛ד <WH1410> of Gad וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to חֲצִ֥י <WH2677> and to the half שֵֽׁבֶט־ <WH7626> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> of Manasseh אֶל־ <WH413> into אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land הַגִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> of Gilead אֶת־ <WH853> פִּינְחָ֖ס <WH6372> Phinehas בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> of Eleazar הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> the priest

וַעֲשָׂרָ֤ה <WH6235> And with him ten נְשִׂאִים֙ <WH5387> princes עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with נָשִׂ֨יא <WH5387> chief אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> one נָשִׂ֤יא <WH5387> chiefs אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אָ֔ב <WH1> a prince לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> each מַטּ֣וֹת <WH4294> throughout all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> and each one רֹ֧אשׁ <WH7218> [was] an head בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house אֲבוֹתָ֛ם <WH1> of their fathers הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> among לְאַלְפֵ֥י <WH505> among the thousands יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> And they came אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> unto the children רְאוּבֵ֧ן <WH7205> of Reuben וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> and to the children גָ֛ד <WH1410> of Gad וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to חֲצִ֥י <WH2677> and to the half שֵֽׁבֶט־ <WH7626> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> of Manasseh אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> unto the land הַגִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> of Gilead וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> and they spake אִתָּ֖ם <WH854> for לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> with them saying

כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> Thus אָמְר֞וּ <WH559> Thus saith כֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> the whole עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> the whole congregation יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD מָֽה־ <WH4100> What הַמַּ֤עַל <WH4603> [is] this that ye have committed הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> is this אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which מְעַלְתֶּם֙ <WH4603> have committed בֵּאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> against the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> to turn away הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> this day מֵאַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> from following יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD בִּבְנֽוֹתְכֶ֤ם <WH1129> in that ye have builded לָכֶם֙ מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> you an altar לִמְרָדְכֶ֥ם <WH4775> that ye might rebel הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> this day בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

הַמְעַט־ <WH4592> too little לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> [Is] the iniquity פְּע֔וֹר <WH6465> of Peor אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not הִטַּהַ֙רְנוּ֙ <WH2891> for us from which we are not cleansed מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> until this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came הַנֶּ֖גֶף <WH5063> although there was a plague בַּעֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> in the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you must תָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <WH7725> But that ye must turn away הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> this day מֵאַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> from following יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> against the LORD וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become אַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> you תִּמְרְד֤וּ <WH4775> rebel הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> to day בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וּמָחָ֕ר <WH4279> that to morrow אֶֽל־ <WH413> with כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole עֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> with the whole congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel יִקְצֹֽף׃ <WH7107> he will be wroth

וְאַ֨ךְ <WH389> Notwithstanding אִם־ <WH518> If טְמֵאָ֜ה <WH2931> [be] unclean אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> if the land אֲחֻזַּתְכֶ֗ם <WH272> of your possession עִבְר֨וּ <WH5674> [then] pass ye over לָכֶ֜ם אֶל־ <WH413> into אֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲחֻזַּ֤ת <WH272> of the possession יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after שָֽׁכַן־ <WH7931> dwelleth שָׁם֙ <WH8033> in it מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <WH4908> tabernacle יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> wherein the LORD'S וְהֵאָחֲז֖וּ <WH270> and take possession בְּתוֹכֵ֑נוּ <WH8432> among וּבַֽיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> not against the LORD אַל־ <WH408> nor תִּמְרֹ֗דוּ <WH4775> us but rebel וְאֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <WH854> against אֶל־ <WH408> not תִּמְרֹ֔דוּ <WH4775> rebel בִּבְנֹֽתְכֶ֤ם <WH1129> against us in building לָכֶם֙ מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> you an altar מִֽבַּלְעֲדֵ֔י <WH1107> beside מִזְבַּ֖ח <WH4196> the altar יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God

הֲל֣וֹא ׀ <WH3808> did not עָכָ֣ן <WH5912> Did not Achan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זֶ֗רַח <WH2226> of Zerah מָ֤עַל <WH4603> commit מַ֙עַל֙ <WH4604> a trespass בַּחֵ֔רֶם <WH2764> in the accursed thing וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> on all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel הָ֣יָה <WH1961> fell קָ֑צֶף <WH7110> and wrath וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> alone אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> not alone לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not גָוַ֖ע <WH1478> perished בַּעֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH5771> in his iniquity פ
